description: The SPENDER Platform is a project conducted by blockchain experts and big-data engineers.SPENDER-X(SPDX) token is a utility token issued for the SPENDER project and can be swapped to cash through an app. The technological base of big-data and blockchain using a consumer compensations system(scanning receipts). Anyone can access the SPENDER platform. In addition, we're preparing an energy production and compensation system through self-generated panels.
name: SPENDER-X
